sentences.sentence: Some of the rabbits will be released into Douglas County, perhaps as early as October, Hays said.
sentences.translation: 今年10月份，其中的一些侏儒兔还将被放归道格拉斯县境内。

sentences.sentence: It was a huge hit with consumers and by 1955 it was "king of the Turkey market," Miller Hays says.
sentences.translation: 它受到了顾客的极大欢迎，至1955年，已成为了火鸡销售之王，米勒·海斯说道。

sentences.sentence: Knowing the locale also can aid in such computer vision tasks as object identification, Hays said.
sentences.translation: 海斯表示，拍摄地的识别还可以有助于目标识别等计算机视觉任务。
